subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Ashley Force beat her father, John, in the National Hot Rod Association’s Southern Nationals in Commerce, Ga., becoming the first woman to win a national Funny Car event. “I think Dad’s done this enough years that he has the same routine and doesn’t care who’s next to him, whether you’re related to him or not,” she said.
